onboarding.setupProfile: Let's set up your profile to get started
onboarding.continueSetup: You can continue setup from Settings anytime.

errors.avatarSize: Avatar image must be less than 5MB
errors.logoSize: Company logo must be less than 5MB

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordTooLong: Password must be less than 100 characters
errors.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
errors.emailRegistered: This email is already registered. Please login instead.
errors.emailRequired: Please enter your email address to reset your password.
errors.switchedToSignup: We switched to Sign Up mode. Click the button to create your account.

success.accountCreated: Account created successfully! You can now log in.
success.biometricSoon: Biometric authentication will be available soon.
success.checkEmail: Check your email for a password reset link.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noProjects: No projects yet. Create your first project to get started!
dashboard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete

projectModeDialog.title: Project Mode
projectModeDialog.description: Create comprehensive field reports and checklists linked to a specific project or customer
projectModeDialog.step1: Create or select a project to organize your reports
projectModeDialog.step2: Add photos, notes, and checklists to the project
projectModeDialog.step3: All data is saved and linked to the project

settings.title: Settings
settings.letterheadDesc: Upload your letterhead to use in PDF and Word document exports
settings.emailBrandingDesc: Customize the look of emails sent to your customers
settings.brandColorDesc: This color will be used for buttons in your email templates
settings.customFooterDesc: Add a personal message to the footer of your emails
settings.twoFactorDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.setup2FADesc: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app, then enter the verification code
settings.secretKeyDesc: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this secret key manually in your authenticator app
settings.verificationCodeDesc: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
settings.gpsStampingDesc: Add location and timestamp to captured photos

captureScreen.title: Capture Photos and Video
captureScreen.takePhotos: Tap to Take Photos/Video or to upload from gallery
captureScreen.takePhotosWithVoice: Tap to Take Photos/Video with Voice Recording
captureScreen.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the progress, issues, or observations...
captureScreen.analyzingContent: Analyzing your photos and notes with AI...
captureScreen.editCaptionDescription: Add or edit the label for this photo. Labels appear below photos in reports.
captureScreen.upgradeToPremium: Upgrade to Premium for longer recording time

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.noTasksHint: Add a task or let AI suggest some for you
tasks.addTaskDescription: Create a new task for your project
tasks.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
tasks.creditsError: AI usage limit reached. Please add credits.
tasks.voiceHint: Speak your tasks and AI will create them for you
tasks.shareDescription: Choose how you want to share this task list
tasks.shareViaEmailDesc: Email the task list to someone
tasks.copyAsTextDesc: Copy the task list to your clipboard
tasks.linkToProjectDescription: Select a project to link these tasks to
tasks.noProjectsAvailable: No projects available. Create a project first.
tasks.linkError: Failed to link tasks to project

newProject.title: New Project/Customer
newProject.jobNumberFormat: Letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only (max 50 chars)
newProject.voiceInputInstructions: Tap the microphone to dictate your Project Name, Customer Name, Job Number, and Job Description. This information will be included in your Field Reports and Checklists.
newProject.tapToFill: Tap to fill form with voice

projects.title: Projects & Customers
projects.searchPlaceholder: Search projects, customers, or job numbers...
projects.noProjects: No projects yet. Create your first project to get started!
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete

notes.title: Add Note
notes.placeholder: Tap the microphone or type your notes here...
notes.voiceInstruction: Tap the microphone button to record your notes
notes.voiceHint: Speak your notes and they'll be transcribed automatically
notes.noContent: Please add some content to your note

saveDialog.title: Save Organized Notes
saveDialog.description: Your notes have been organized by AI. Choose how to save or share them.

savedNotes.title: Saved Notes
savedNotes.noNotesFound: No notes found matching your search
savedNotes.editDialogDescription: Make changes to your note below
savedNotes.deleteDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.
savedNotes.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a moment.
savedNotes.creditsError: AI credits depleted. Please add credits to continue.

checklist.title: Lets Create a Checklist
checklist.takePhotos: Tap to Take Photos/Video or to upload from gallery (Optional)
checklist.recordInstructions: Press Record to describe checklist items
checklist.recordDetails: Tap again to stop. You can record multiple times to add more details.
checklist.voiceHint: Describe what needs to be checked and AI will create your checklist
checklist.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
checklist.creditsError: AI credits depleted. Please add credits to continue.
checklist.generateFailed: Failed to generate checklist. Please try again.
checklist.errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
checklist.imageDeletedToast: Image deleted. Tap undo to restore.
checklist.recordingStarted: Recording started - tap again to stop

checklistConfirmation.title: Confirmation
checklistConfirmation.chooseExisting: Choose an existing project or save as standalone
checklistConfirmation.signInRequired: Please sign in to save to cloud

finalReport.title: Final Report
finalReport.couldNotLoad: The report could not be loaded. Please try again or go back to the dashboard.
finalReport.preparingPDF: Your report is being prepared as a PDF file.
finalReport.savedAsPDF: Your report has been saved as a PDF file.
finalReport.preparingWord: Your report is being prepared as a Word document.
finalReport.savedAsWord: Your report has been saved as a Word document.
finalReport.linkCopiedDesc: Report link has been copied to clipboard.

projectDetail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete

savedReports.title: Saved Reports
savedReports.noMatches: No reports found matching your search
savedReports.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this report?

allContent.title: All Content
allContent.searchPlaceholder: Search by project, customer, job number...
allContent.emptyState: No content yet. Create your first project to get started!
allContent.emailExportDescription: Send the exported content via email. Large files will be sent as download links.
allContent.subject: Subject (Optional)
allContent.largeFilesNote: Files larger than 25MB will be sent as download links.
allContent.signInToSendEmail: Please sign in to send emails
allContent.uploadingToCloud: File is large, uploading to cloud storage...
allContent.uploadFailed: Failed to upload file to storage

common.recordingStarted: Recording started - tap again to stop

reportType.fieldDesc: Site conditions, work observed, issues found
reportType.monthlyDesc: Aggregates weekly reports into monthly summary
reportType.autoDetectDesc: Include daily reports from this week
reportType.autoDetectMonthlyDesc: Include weekly reports from this month
reportType.manualSelectDesc: Choose which daily reports to include
reportType.manualSelectMonthlyDesc: Choose which weekly reports to include
reportType.freshStartDesc: Create report from current content only
reportType.autoDetectInfo: {{count}} daily report(s) from this week will be included
reportType.autoDetectMonthlyInfo: {{count}} weekly report(s) from this month will be included
reportType.timelineDesc: Visual timeline of project progress with AI narrative

timeline.title: Project Timeline
timeline.enableGPS: Enable GPS stamping in Settings to track photo dates
timeline.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
timeline.creditsError: AI credits depleted. Please add credits.

share.publicLinkDesc: Create a public link that anyone can access without logging in. Links auto-expire for security.
share.teamAccessDesc: Invite team members who will need to log in to view. More secure with access tracking.
share.alreadyInvited: This person has already been invited
share.linkInvalid: This share link is invalid or has expired.

mediaLink.linkedContentDesc: Add notes, checklist items, or tasks linked to this photo
mediaLink.addNotePlaceholder: Add a note about this photo...
mediaLink.noNotes: No notes linked to this photo
mediaLink.noChecklist: No checklist items linked to this photo
mediaLink.noTasks: No tasks linked to this photo
mediaLink.needsProject: Link this capture to a project first to add checklist items

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.subtitle: Follow these steps to make the most of your app
gettingStarted.step0Desc: Set up your profile with your name and company info. This can be bypassed from the onboarding screen.
gettingStarted.step1Desc: Start by creating a new project with your job details, customer info, and job number.
gettingStarted.step2Title: Take a Photo, Video, or Note
gettingStarted.step2Desc: Capture on-site photos, record videos, or dictate voice notes ‚Äî all organized automatically.
gettingStarted.step3Title: Choose a Report Template & Create a Report
gettingStarted.step3Desc: Pick from Field, Daily, Weekly, Monthly, or Site Survey templates ‚Äî AI generates your report instantly.
gettingStarted.step4Desc: Email PDF reports, generate shareable links, export to Word, or invite team members to collaborate.

capture.cameraDesc: Tap here to open the camera. Take photos and record voice notes to document your work.
capture.notesDesc: Your voice recordings and notes appear here. You can also type directly. Add more notes anytime!
capture.generateDesc: When you're done capturing, tap here to generate an AI-powered report from your photos and notes.
capture.addNoteDesc: Tap here to create detailed notes with voice dictation or typing. Notes are saved and linked to your project.
capture.tasksDesc: Create and manage tasks for your project. Use AI to suggest tasks or dictate them with your voice.
capture.checklistDesc: Generate AI-powered checklists or create your own. Track items as you complete them on site.

toolbar.flashDesc: Cycle through flash modes: Off ‚Üí Auto ‚Üí On. Great for low-light conditions.
toolbar.hdrDesc: Toggle High Dynamic Range for better detail in bright and dark areas.
toolbar.gridDesc: Show a rule-of-thirds grid to help compose your shots.
toolbar.fullscreenDesc: Expand the camera to fill your entire screen for a better view.
toolbar.switchCameraDesc: Toggle between front and back cameras, or choose from available devices.
toolbar.modeToggleDesc: Switch between Photo and Video modes. Video mode lets you record audio notes while capturing.

photo.shutterDesc: Tap this button to capture a photo. You can take multiple photos before closing.
photo.aiNotesDesc: Tap to start recording voice notes. Your speech is transcribed and added to your report.
photo.stopDesc: Tap Stop to save your voice notes. You can start a new recording anytime.

video.recordDesc: Tap to begin recording audio notes while you work. Photos can be taken during recording.
video.pauseDesc: Pause your recording when you need a break, then resume when ready.
video.photoDesc: Take photos while recording ‚Äî great for documenting as you narrate.
video.stopDesc: Tap Stop to finish and save your recording. Notes are transcribed automatically.

notes.textareaDesc: Type or paste your notes here. Voice recordings will also appear in this area after transcription.
notes.voiceDesc: Tap to start recording. Speak your notes and they'll be automatically transcribed into text.
notes.quickSaveDesc: Save your notes instantly to your project. They'll be available in your Saved Notes section.
notes.saveOptionsDesc: Download as PDF, Word document, save to cloud storage, or email your notes.

tasks.addDesc: Manually create a new task with a title, description, and priority level.
tasks.aiSuggestDesc: Let AI analyze your project and suggest relevant tasks automatically.
tasks.voiceDesc: Dictate your tasks by voice. AI will transcribe and create tasks from what you say.
tasks.filtersDesc: Filter tasks by status: All, Pending, In Progress, or Completed.
tasks.actionsDesc: Save your task list to a project, print it, or share it via email or as copied text.

checklist.voiceDesc: Describe what needs to be checked and AI will generate a structured checklist from your voice.
checklist.cameraDesc: Optionally add photos for AI to analyze. It can generate checklist items based on what it sees.
checklist.generateDesc: Tap to generate an AI-powered checklist from your photos. Add voice notes for more specific results.
checklist.previousDesc: View and reuse your previously created checklists. Tap any to preview and navigate to it.
